page.title: 02 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: From our questionnaire we discovered that there are more people in {professions}than any other occupation, even more than the total number of {retired}people, which was the second largest group. After{professions,}the commonest occupation is{office work}followed by {factory work, domestic work, sales}and {transport}all of which were very close together. We expected more people to be employed in{agriculture,}but we found this was the smallest group except for those who follow{trades. The majority of people travel out of Kirk Ireton to work. Several people work in{Derby, Matlock, Ashbourne, {Wirksworth, Belper, Hulland}and {Milford.}A few do work in other places and some are travelling all the time.
